KNOWNHOST - AWARD WINNING VPS PROMO – NEW UPGRADES PLANS, KVM and OpenVZ, LIFETIME DISCOUNTS, FREE MIGRATION

Don’t you hate it when you sign up for a hosting plan with special features or pricing only to find out a few months later you must pay extra? Like what, you are not a valuable anymore because you are a customer?

To KNOWNHOST, you are always valuable! Here is how we prove it to you every day:

100% SSD BACKED. All services are backed by SSD Arrays and SSD Storage Clusters!

PROVEN UPTIME. 99.996% uptime record that is top of the industry! Why? Because you want hosting, not excuses.

ALWAYS ONLINE SUPPORT. 24/7/365 customer support. You contact us. We answer. Simple, right? We’ve got you covered from initial setup to support 24 hours a day

30 DAYS MONEY BACK. Anyone can behave for a few days. Once the NEW customer label clicks off your account, most hosting companies struggle to remember your account number.

Try us out for 30 days, poke into all the features, and test our customer service. You don’t love KNOWNHOST -> you get your money back.

People are Talking About KNOWNHOST:

KNOWNHOST was ranked top of the list for Best Support 2016 & Best Managed VPS Hosting 2016. Check it out: http://reviewsignal.com/blog/2017/01/17/review-signals-best-web-hosting-companies-in-2016/

KnownHost Sneak Peek Promotion!: At KNOWNHOST, our goal is to keep you as a customer for LIFE. Yep…forever and ever! How do we do that? Great service and support…excellent price with lifetime benefits.
You will receive a 30% lifetime discount on the MVPS-1 or larger. If you start with the MVPS-1 and later decide to upgrade the 30% lifetime discount remains FOREVER, so in turn your discount increases.
